metadata.title: CVE-2022-36879 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.18.14.xfrm_expand_policies in net/xfrm/xfrm_policy.c can cause a refcount to bedropped twice.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
